data.name: Colossal Fighter/Assault Mode
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Assault Mode Activate". When this card is Special Summoned, you can send up to 2 Warrior-Type monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for every Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard. When this card on the field is destroyed, you can Special Summon 1 "Colossal Fighter" from your Graveyard.

card_sets.set_name: Crimson Crisis Sneak Peek Participation Card

data.name: Dark Voltanis
data.desc: After 1 Counter Trap Card you control has been activated and has resolved, you can Tribute 1 DARK monster to Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned in this way, destroy 1 card on the field.

data.name: Greed Quasar
data.desc: This card's original ATK and DEF are each equal to its Level x 300. This monster's Level is increased by the Level of monsters it destroys by battle.

data.name: Ido the Supreme Magical Force
data.desc: You cannot Summon monsters. You can only control 1 "Ido the Supreme Magical Force". If this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard, Special Summon it from your Graveyard during the next turn's Standby Phase and destroy all other monsters you control.

data.name: Prime Material Falcon
data.desc: When an Effect Monster's effect to destroy a Spell or Trap Card(s) on the field is activated, you can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to negate its activation and destroy the card.

data.name: Puppet King
data.desc: When your opponent adds a Monster Card(s) to their hand, except by drawing, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. If you do, destroy it during your next turn's End Phase.

data.name: Tethys, Goddess of Light
data.desc: When you draw a Fairy monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can reveal 1 of those monsters; draw 1 card. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

data.name: Zeta Reticulant
data.desc: You can Tribute 1 "Eva Token" to Special Summon this card from your hand. While this card is in your Graveyard, each time a monster(s) your opponent controls is removed from play, Special Summon 1 "Eva Token" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 2/ATK 500/DEF 500).
